CAPYBARA 

 Capy bara is an animal , known for its indespicable meme presence due to its soo cool attitude
 towards threats faced , with one of its fierce rival being THE Pelican and lucky capy has got some
 jetpacks to its aid

PELICAN

 Pelican is the bird , which is known for its non-terminating rivalry with the capybara, having
 the ability to fly it easily evades target and chases the capyyyy
